IBehaviorObject Class Reference

IBehaviorObject is an interface for providing contact related functionality. Any objects that modify contact data are required to implement this class. FTW! More...

virtual const Behavior GetBehavior (void)=0

Detailed Description

IBehaviorObject is an interface for providing contact related functionality. Any objects that modify contact data are required to implement this class. FTW!
